transfer.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` using the allowance mechanism.

approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of the caller.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given name, symbol, and total supply.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places the token uses.

Approval.description: Emitted when `spender` is approved to spend `value` tokens on behalf of `owner`.

Transfer.description: Emitted when `amount` tokens are transferred from `from` to `to`.
